about_the_game:
The Wreck Original Soudtrack includes 10 tracks from the game soundtrack, composed by Adrien Larouzee & COLORSWAP.

Adrien Larouzee is a synthesist and electronic music composer from Paris (France), specialized in emotive yet danceable productions.

COLORSWAP is an indie electronica duo composed of Rafael & Luis Torres, two brothers from Marseille (France)

10 tracks, 32 mn. Includes MP3 and WAV files.

You'll find the files in your Steam directory upon purchase: ...Steam\steamapps\music\Sountrack - The Wreck
